summary: Add dune build support replacing ocamlbuild/topkg build system
details:
- Added `dune-project` file with lang dune 3.21 and package definition
- Added root `dune` file with compiler flags (`-g -bin-annot -safe-string`) matching original ocamlbuild configuration
- Added `src/dune` defining the library with `(wrapped false)` to maintain API compatibility
- Added `test/dune` for building the example executable
- Renamed `opam` to `htmlit.opam` (standard dune convention)
- Updated opam dependencies: replaced `ocamlfind`, `ocamlbuild`, and `topkg` with just `dune`
- Changed build command from `ocaml pkg/pkg.ml build` to standard dune build commands
